medical_history.chief_complaint: Right lower quadrant abdominal pain associated with nausea and vomiting.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began less than 24 hours prior to admission. The pain has remained localized to the right lower quadrant since onset and is associated with nausea and poor appetite. There have been regular bowel movements. The patient felt warm but could not remember checking her temperature or if she had fevers.
medical_history.family_history: Pancreatic cancer on father's side of family.
